dcterms:creator: B.H. Menze
et al.
dcterms:description: The BraTs MRI dataset consists of multimodal brain tumor images used for segmentation tasks. In this study, 34000 2D slices were extracted from the original volumes, retaining only those slices with less than 80% black pixels.
dcterms:title: BraTs MRI

dcterms:description: The Chest X-ray dataset consists of 10000 chest radiographs used for automated abnormality classification. The dataset was utilized to evaluate the performance of the proposed method in classifying the presence of pathology.
dcterms:title: Chest X-ray
